Agents.Base

Class BasePerceptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agents.Base.BasePerceptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Perceptions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanPerceptions, ZombiePerceptions

    public abstract class BasePerceptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements Perceptions
    Base class for the perceptions classes of the agents of the zombie epidemic environment

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> nearHumans
      List of positions of the humans perceived (the origin of coordinates is the agent's current position)
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> nearZombies
      List of positions of the zombies perceived (the origin of coordinates is the agent's current position)
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Line2D> walls
      List of walls perceived (the origin of coordinates is the agent's current position)
